name: Adobe Extension Package
summary: Learn about .MXP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Extensions can be managed using Extension Manager, a program that allows users to enable and disable extensions for Adobe programs. Extension Manager is commonly bundled with Adobe software purchases.

description: Add-on used by Adobe Creative Suite applications such as Flash, Dreamweaver, Photoshop, and Premiere Pro; adds additional functionality to the software, such as new menus or toolbars.
